scripts.deploy:mainnet: EVM_NETWORK=mainnet pnpm gen:ids && source .env && forge script script/solidity/Deploy.s.sol --fork-url $MAINNET_RPC_URL --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --verify --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_KEY -vvvv --broadcast && EVM_NETWORK=mainnet pnpm prep-release
scripts.deploy:goerli: EVM_NETWORK=goerli pnpm gen:ids && source .env && forge script script/solidity/Deploy.s.sol --fork-url $GOERLI_RPC_URL --private-key $PRIVATE_KEY --verify --etherscan-api-key $ETHERSCAN_KEY -vvvv --broadcast && EVM_NETWORK=goerli pnpm prep-release
scripts.gen:ids:
forge script ./script/solidity/GetInterfaceId.s.sol | tr -d '
' | grep -o '== Logs ==.*' | awk -F'== Logs ==' '/== Logs ==/{print $2}' | tr -d '[:space:]' > src/json/interfaceIds.json && bob-tsm script/js/buildInterfaceIdsFile.ts  && pnpm prettier:write
scripts.prepack: rm -rf out out-2 dist typechain && pnpm gen:ids && pnpm build && cp -r out out-2 && rm -rf ./out-2/test.sol && rm -rf ./out-2/*.t.sol && rm -rf ./out-2/Mock*.sol && find ./out-2 -name '*.metadata.json' -delete && pnpm run typechain && bob-tsm build.ts
scripts.prep-release: bob-tsm script/js/buildInterfaceIdsFile.ts && bob-tsm script/js/buildAddressJsonFile.ts && pnpm prettier:write
scripts.release:canary: (node script/js/canary-release.js && pnpm -r publish --access public --no-git-checks --tag alpha) || echo Skipping Canary...
scripts.test:coverage: forge coverage --contracts contracts --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info --branch-coverage --output-directory coverage --legend
